channel.title: Projects on mpostument.com
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on mpostument.com

item.title: ebs-autoresize
item.description: About project ebs-autoresize provides a command line tool to automatically resize AWS EBS based on used spaced. Can be used with cron for regular disk size check and resize. Install Download the latest binary from releases Docs https://github.com/mpostument/ebs-autoresize/blob/master/README.MD
item.content:
About project

ebs-autoresize provides a command line tool to automatically resize AWS EBS based on used spaced. Can be used with cron for regular disk size check and resize.

Install

Download the latest binary from releases

Docs

https://github.com/mpostument/ebs-autoresize/blob/master/README.MD

item.title: grafana-sync
item.description: About project grafana-sync provides a command line tool to ease import grafana dashboards in json format and export them back to grafana. Install Download the latest binary from releases Docs https://github.com/mpostument/grafana-sync/blob/master/README.MD
item.content:
About project

grafana-sync provides a command line tool to ease import grafana dashboards in json format and export them back to grafana.

Install

Download the latest binary from releases

Docs

https://github.com/mpostument/grafana-sync/blob/master/README.MD

item.title: AWSTagHelper
item.description: About project Tags are critical to managing AWS resources at scale. AWSTagHelper provides a command line tool to ease adding and managing tags to and from CSV files across the wide range of AWS resources. Install Download the latest binary from releases Docs https://github.com/mpostument/awstaghelper/blob/master/README.MD
item.content:
About project

Tags are critical to managing AWS resources at scale. AWSTagHelper provides a command line tool to ease adding and managing tags to and from CSV files across the wide range of AWS resources.

Install

Download the latest binary from releases

Docs

https://github.com/mpostument/awstaghelper/blob/master/README.MD
